name: Zoot
overview: The Story So Far... Zoot's favourite game is marbles. Unfortunately, he’s lost them down the drain. Can you help him retrieve his precious collection? He and his friend Super Zip explore the caves where strange creatures roam around: So look out - the Mankins are about. THE MANKINS: Goopa's pretty dumb, Bodkin's shy, Cheeky's indestructible when his tongue is out, Spike has a habit of turning into an egg when he's scared (chicken ...!), Grimbo's really a Jekyll and Jekyll, Bogie's justdisgusting, Uggy is down right disgusting and has one-sided habits and Nevil’s got terminal B.O. GAMEPLAY: Zoot must collect his marbles without losing all his 4 lives. To pass through each cavern, Zoot must perform certain jobs. His friend Super Zip will help if you stand around and wait.
